Get Started

Driving Impact on Earth and Beyond

Impact Orbit unites strategy, innovation, and technology to help organisations deliver tangible, systemic outcomes across space, sustainability, and emerging technologies.

LEARN MORE

15+

Years in the Space Industry

Green Orbit Digital actively collaborates with a diverse network of organisations to advance sustainability and innovation across the space sector. Our partnerships span industry, research, and advocacy, helping amplify the impact of space-based solutions.

We engage with UK-EONS to work alongside leading Earth observation organisations, and the Space Enterprise Community, connecting with key UK space industry players. As members of UKspace and Space for Climate, we advocate for space-enabled climate solutions that deliver tangible environmental benefits.

On the European stage, we contribute to the European Association of Remote Sensing Companies (EARSC), promoting the use of satellite data for sustainability. We also support the IAU Committee on the Protection of the Dark and Quiet Sky, ensuring responsible satellite operations to protect night skies.

Additionally, through the BSI Sustainable Space Community, we help define standards for environmentally responsible space practices. Together, these collaborations allow Green Orbit Digital to foster a sustainable and innovative space ecosystem.

Organisations

  • ACT Climate Labs

    ACT Climate Labs is a collaborative initiative developing creative campaigns and strategies to inspire large-scale climate action and public engagement.

  • Association of British Science Writers

    The Association of British Science Writers supports, promotes, and defends the professional interests of science writers, journalists, and communicators in the UK.

    mediaprofessional society

  • B Lab UK

    B Lab UK certifies and supports businesses that meet high standards of social and environmental performance, transparency, and accountability.

    businesscertification

  • BSI Sustainable Space Community

    The BSI Sustainable Space Community is a forum for organisations committed to developing standards and practices that ensure space activities are environmentally and socially responsible.

    professional training & coachingindustry group

  • Carbon Literacy Project

    The Carbon Literacy Project delivers training and awareness programmes to empower individuals and organisations to reduce carbon emissions and act on climate change.

    sustainabilityproject

  • CharityComms

    CharityComms is the professional membership network for charity communicators, providing training, best practice, and peer support to enhance impact across the sector.

    nonprofit organisation managementtrade association

  • Chartered Institute of Marketing

    The Chartered Institute of Marketing is the world’s leading professional marketing body, providing training, resources, and accreditation to marketers worldwide.

    marketingprofessional association

  • Chartered Institute of Public Relations

    The Chartered Institute of Public Relations is a professional body representing PR practitioners, promoting best practice, skills development, and ethical standards.

    public relationsprofessional association

  • Circular Economy Club

    The Circular Economy Club is a global non-profit network connecting professionals and organisations to accelerate the transition to a circular economy.

    environmental servicesnon-profit

  • Climate Impact Partners

    Climate Impact Partners delivers high-quality carbon credit solutions and climate finance to help organisations achieve net-zero goals while supporting sustainable development projects.

    environmental servicesindustry group

  • Climate Perks

    Climate Perks partners with employers to offer paid travel days for low-carbon journeys, encouraging sustainable transport choices and reducing business travel emissions.

    environmental servicesngo

  • Climate Voice

    Climate Voice mobilises employees, students, and the public to push organisations towards bold climate action and advocacy for systemic environmental change.

    environmental servicesadvocacy group

  • ClimateAction.tech

    ClimateAction.tech is a community of tech professionals taking climate action by sharing knowledge, tools, and best practices for building a sustainable digital future.

    technologynetwork

  • Copernicus EU

    The Copernicus programme monitors the Earth using satellite data to support environmental management, climate monitoring, and disaster response in Europe.

    spaceprogramme

Impact Orbit Creative Group

Impact Orbit Creative Group is a multi-disciplinary consultancy and innovation hub focused on driving sustainable growth, digital transformation, and impact-led strategies in the space and technology sectors. We partner with organisations and startups worldwide to deliver strategic guidance, communications expertise, and frameworks for responsible innovation.

We partner with organisations and startups worldwide to deliver strategic guidance, communications expertise, and frameworks for responsible innovation.
